long_description: A versatile ride for bike paths, dirt roads and urban commutes, the Cannondale Althea 2 women's bike puts you in a comfortable upright riding position and smooths bumps with a shock-absorbent fork. Hybrid design blends the speed of a road bike with the sturdy, heads-up ride of a mountain-bike inspired frame; low stand-over height makes mounts and dismounts easy. SR Suntour NCX suspension fork provides 50mm of pothole-damping suspension; suspension can be locked out when it's not needed. Frame also uses Cannondale Synapse Active Vibration Elimination (S.A.V.E.) technology to damp road vibration for a smoother ride quality. Find that just-right gear easily with the Shimano shifters, which guide the derailleurs quickly and precisely through the 24 gears. Cannondale hydraulic disc brakes deliver powerful braking in all riding conditions. Kenda Happy Medium tires have a fast-rolling center with aggressive outside lugs for enhanced cornering traction. Platform pedals accommodate everyday shoes-just hop on and go. Specs on the Cannondale Althea 2 women's bike are subject to change.
